headline: A Fresh Look at Forward Industries (FORD) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Forward Industries (FORD) shares ticked lower today, with the stock closing down nearly 12%. Despite the lack of a headline event, investors appear to be reassessing their positions following recent gains over the past month. See our latest analysis for Forward Industries. After a remarkable surge, with Forward Industries' 90-day share price return sitting at 136.28% and the year-to-date share price up an eye-catching 334.13%, today's drop hints that some investors are locking in profits or...
